thread.title: Flydubai sale: Book your getaway for as low as Dh600
thread.title_full: Flydubai sale: Book your getaway for as low as Dh600

title: Flydubai sale: Book your getaway for as low as Dh600
text: Flydubai sale: Book your getaway for as low as Dh600 Web Team /Dubai Filed on February 24, 2017 | Last updated on February 24, 2017 at 12.59 pm Share Vote Your adventure begins this weekend! Here is a fact: flying away to someplace can sometimes be expensive. Adventures costs time, money and even careful planning. But what if we tell you that you can fly on the cheap for this weekend, and this weekend alone? Starting today until Saturday midnight, flydubai is offering residents a great discount off return flights in both economy and business classes. Flyers can enjoy 25% to 35% off of select locations when they travel by June 20 of this year. How big is the discount you ask? Let's just say you can go on an adventure for as low as Dh600. You can even enjoy parts of Europe for Dh1,000 - and its comes as no secret that a European getaway can be expensive. So whether you fancy Central Asia, Europe or even around Dubai's MENA neighbors, you're guaranteed to save up some money with flydubai. Money that you can use to buy some souvenirs or maybe make the most out of your holiday. Share
